judicialResults.label: Community order England / Wales
judicialResults.resultText:
COEW - Community order England / Wales
Community order made. The defendant must comply with the requirements (shown below) by 04/04/2025.

judicialResultPrompts.label: End date of exclusion
judicialResultPrompts.welshLabel: Dyddiad terfyn ar gyfer cau allan

judicialResults.label: Exclusion not to enter with between dates
judicialResults.resultText:
ERBD - Exclusion not to enter with between dates
Exclusion Requirement: Not to enter Place / area test between 10/10/2025 and 10/11/2026. This exclusion requirement lasts until 10/10/2027.

judicialResultPrompts.welshValue: methu â chydymffurfio â gofynion goruchwyliaeth ar ôl dedfryd o garchar

judicialResultPrompts.label: Reason for custody
judicialResultPrompts.value: because the offence was aggravated by being committed whilst on bail, because the offence was committed during the operational period of a suspended sentence
judicialResultPrompts.welshValue: because the offence was aggravated by being committed whilst on bail, because the offence was committed during the operational period of a suspended sentence

judicialResultPrompts.label: Bail remand days to count (tagged days)
judicialResultPrompts.welshLabel: Dyddiau mechnïaeth ar remand i’w cyfrif (dyddiad gyda tag)

judicialResultPrompts.label: This offence is aggravated by the foreign power condition being met in relation to it as defined by section 31 of the National Security Act 2023

judicialResults.label: Imprisonment
judicialResults.resultText:
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 6 Years. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision because the offence was aggravated by being committed whilst on bail, because the offence was committed during the operational period of a suspended sentence. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 44. Total custodial period: 6 Years.

judicialResults.label: No surcharge
judicialResults.resultText:
NOVS - No surcharge
Reason: No reasons
